property_title: The Zahya Signature 5 Bedroom Villas+Maid
property_description:
Step into luxury living at its finest with these stunning villas in the heart of Al Zahia – Ajman’s most sought-after community. With a modern entrance, lush indoor & outdoor landscaping, and smart home technology, these villas are designed to impress from the very first glance.

Located just 1 minute from Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, you’ll enjoy unbeatable connectivity while living in a private, serene setting. The villas feature a 20-meter wide parking space in front, along with indoor parking for your convenience.

The villas are equipped with smart entry systems, smart home features, surveillance cameras, and warranties, ensuring peace of mind and a secure lifestyle for you and your family.

Property Details:

  • - Plot Area: 3,014 sq. ft.

  • - Built-up Area: 3,400 sq. ft.

  • - Price: AED 1,950,000 (including registration fees)

  • - Freehold for all nationalities

Key Highlights:

  • - Grand Majlis (guest sitting room) with private Washroom

  • - Spacious family living room

  • - 5 master bedrooms with en-suite luxury washrooms

  • - Stylish modern kitchen with pantry

  • - Maid’s room for extra convenience

  • - Outdoor sitting area & balcony to relax and unwind

  • - Indoor parking + 20m wide front parking

This is an excellent opportunity for both homeowners and investors. This is more than just a villa – it’s a lifestyle upgrade where luxury meets convenience. Perfect for families who want space, style, and security in one of Ajman’s most prime locations.

property_title: Luxurious G+2 Villa in Al Aamra, Ajman
property_description:
• Plot: 3,015 Sqft | BUA: 3,500 Sqft

  • Sale Price: AED 2.2 Million

  • Location: Al Aamra, Ajman

Step into luxury with this elegantly designed G+2 villa located in a peaceful and prime area of Al Aamra, Ajman. This spacious home offers a perfect blend of functionality and comfort, ideal for large families.

The ground floor welcomes you with a majlis, family hall, dining area, modern kitchen, and 3 common toilets. The villa also includes 2 dedicated study rooms, a stunning master bedroom with en-suite bath and private balcony, and 4 additional bedrooms, each with attached dress areas and T&B.

Enjoy extra convenience with 2 pantries, a maid’s room with attached bath, laundry room, and a large open terrace perfect for gatherings or relaxation.

Villa Highlights:

  • 5 Spacious Master Bedrooms

  • Private Lift (Elevator) for Convenience

  • Separate Majlis with Privacy

  • Maid’s Room

  • Bright Living Hall

  • Kitchen Space with Modern Layout

property_title: Spacious 5BR Villa in Al Helio 2, Ajman
property_description:
This is your chance to own a freehold 5-bedroom villa in the highly desirable Al Yasmeen area of Ajman, at a truly competitive price!

Built on a 3,100 sqft plot with thoughtful design, this home features 5 master bedrooms, 8 bathrooms, a majlis, a cozy family hall, a main kitchen with prep kitchen, storage, and a service room — everything a family needs.

Enjoy year-round comfort with split AC units installed throughout. Located just steps from Hamidiya Park, mosques, supermarkets, and schools — plus direct access to E311 (Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road) — this villa offers both lifestyle and convenience.

  • Sale Price: AED 1,400,000

  • Ownership: Freehold (All Nationalities Welcome)

  • Location: Al Yasmeen, Ajman

property_title: Spaciously Elegant  2-Bedroom Apartment for Sale – Cornish Towers, Ajman
property_description:
Presenting a beautifully renovated high-floor corner unit in the prestigious Cornish Towers, offering stunning sea views.

Al Rumailah 2 is a vibrant, well-connected community in Ajman known for its blend of traditional charm and modern living, particularly along the coastline. It offers a range of residential options, from apartments to villas, suitable for singles, couples, and families. The area boasts a prime location near the Ajman Corniche, City Centre Ajman, and Al Rashidiya Park, with convenient access to Sheikh Humaid Bin Rashid Al Nuaimi Street.

  • Size: 2,100 sqft

  • Layout: Recently upgraded with quality finishes throughout

  • View: Corner unit with sea view and city views

  • Parking: 1 dedicated parking spot included

Perfect for end-users or investors seeking space, views, and central location by the waterfront.

property_title: Spacious 3BR + Maid Apartment Creek View
property_description:
Busy, downtown Al Rashidiya 1 is the creekside home of Ajman Fish Market, surrounded by waterfront seafood restaurants. Shawarma cafes, curry houses, and coffee shops pack lively shopping streets lined with florists and boutiques. There are mid-range stores in Dana Mall and City Life Al Khor Mall, as well as bargains at the Middle East Discount Center. A few family-friendly hotels are scattered throughout the area.

  • Price: AED 600,000 (Net)

  • Size: 2,200 Sq. Ft.

  • View: High Floor with Stunning Creek View

  • Parking: Included

Property Features:

  • Clean well Maintained Building

  • 3 Bedrooms + Maid Room

  • 4 Bathrooms

  • Closed Kitchen

  • Spacious Living Area

  • Balcony with Panoramic Views

  • High-Floor Unit with Plenty of Natural Light

Perfect for families or investors looking for a well-sized unit with excellent views and central convenience.

property_title: Brand New Spacious 6-Bedroom+ Maid Villa
property_description:
A spacious and well-designed 6-bedroom + Maid villa located in the peaceful residential area of Helio 2. This property is ideal for families seeking comfort, privacy, and convenience. This villa offers a great layout with generous living spaces, quality finishes, and a family-friendly environment. Situated close to essential amenities, schools, and main access roads.

  • Location: Helio 2, Ajman

  • Price: AED 1,800,000 (Including Transfer Fees)

  • Plot Size: 3,014 sq. ft.

  • Built-Up Area: 4,000 sq. ft.

Property Features:

  • 6 Spacious Bedrooms with Balconey

  • 7 Modern Bathrooms

  • Elegant Majlis for guests

  • Large Living Hall for family gatherings

  • Fully Equipped Kitchen

  • Maid’s Room with attached bathroom

  • Private Roof Tower

  • perfect for relaxing or extra storage

  • Multiple Parking Spots

  • Located just steps away from the Masjid

It is freehold in a family-friendly neighborhood, close to schools, supermarkets, and main roads. Don’t miss out on this rare opportunity to own a ready-to-move-in villa in one of Ajman's most peaceful areas!

property_title: Luxurious 5-Bedroom Villa for Sale – Al Amerah
property_description:
Discover elegant living in this spacious 5-bedroom villa located in the highly sought-after Al Aamra area.

  • Price: AED 1,750,000

  • Villa Area: 3,500 sq.ft

  • Land Area: 3,014 sq.ft

Perfectly designed for family comfort and style, this home offers:

  • A grand hall and separate majlis for formal gatherings

  • Fully equipped kitchen with ample storage

  • Dedicated store room

  • Private maid’s room

This is a rare opportunity to own a beautifully designed villa that blends luxury with practicality, offering generous space and top-tier amenities—all at a competitive price.
